modules.title: Module 4: Basic Tactics - Forks, Pins, and Skewers

topics.title: What are Tactics?
topics.description: Defining chess tactics and their importance.

topics.title: Forks
topics.description: Attacking two or more pieces simultaneously.

topics.title: Knight Forks
topics.description: Exploiting the knight's forking ability.

topics.title: Pawn Forks
topics.description: Using pawns to create forks.

topics.title: Pins
topics.description: Restricting a piece's movement by attacking a more valuable piece behind it.

topics.title: Absolute Pins
topics.description: Pins where the pinned piece cannot move without exposing the King to check.

topics.title: Relative Pins
topics.description: Pins where the pinned piece can still move, but at a cost.

topics.title: Skewers
topics.description: Attacking a more valuable piece, forcing it to move and expose a less valuable piece.

topics.title: X-Ray Attacks
topics.description: Understanding attacks that go through other pieces.

topics.title: Quiz: Forks, Pins, and Skewers
topics.description: Test your knowledge of basic chess tactics.

topics.title: Module 4 Practice
topics.description: Practice identifying and executing tactical motifs.

topics.title: Module 4 Review
topics.description: Review of forks, pins, and skewers.

modules.title: Module 5: Basic Tactics - Discoveries and Deflections

topics.title: Discovered Attacks
topics.description: Unveiling an attack by moving a piece.

topics.title: Discovered Checks
topics.description: Unveiling a check by moving a piece.

topics.title: Double Checks
topics.description: Attacking the King with two pieces simultaneously.

topics.title: Deflection
topics.description: Forcing a piece to move to a less desirable square.

topics.title: Overloading
topics.description: Exploiting a piece that has too many defensive responsibilities.

topics.title: Interference
topics.description: Blocking a line of attack or defense.

topics.title: Sacrifices
topics.description: Intentionally giving up material for a tactical or strategic advantage.

topics.title: Combination of Tactics
topics.description: Using multiple tactics in a sequence.

topics.title: Tactical Vision
topics.description: Improving your ability to spot tactical opportunities.

topics.title: Quiz: Discoveries and Deflections
topics.description: Test your knowledge of advanced tactics.

topics.title: Module 5 Practice
topics.description: Practice identifying and executing advanced tactical motifs.

topics.title: Module 5 Review
topics.description: Review of discoveries and deflections.

topics.title: Back Rank Mate
topics.description: Checkmating the king on the back rank.

topics.title: Smothered Mate
topics.description: Checkmating the king with a knight when it is surrounded by its own pieces.

topics.title: Epaulette Mate
topics.description: Checkmating the king with rooks or queens on either side.

topics.title: Boden's Mate
topics.description: Checkmating the king with two bishops along diagonals.

topics.title: Pawn Mate
topics.description: Checkmating with a pawn.

topics.title: Queen and King Checkmate
topics.description: Delivering checkmate with a queen and king.

topics.title: Rook and King Checkmate
topics.description: Delivering checkmate with a rook and king.

topics.title: Two Bishops Checkmate
topics.description: Delivering checkmate with two bishops and king.

topics.title: Checkmate in the Opening
topics.description: Recognizing early checkmate opportunities.

topics.title: Quiz: Checkmate Patterns
topics.description: Test your knowledge of checkmate patterns.

topics.description: Practice delivering checkmates in different scenarios.

topics.title: Module 6 Review
topics.description: Review of checkmate patterns.

topics.title: King Activity
topics.description: The importance of an active king in the endgame.

topics.title: Opposition
topics.description: Understanding and using opposition to control the board.

topics.title: Passed Pawns
topics.description: Creating and promoting passed pawns.

topics.title: Rook Endgames
topics.description: Basic rook endgame techniques.

topics.title: King and Pawn vs. King
topics.description: Winning with a king and pawn against a lone king.

topics.title: Queen vs. Pawn Endgame
topics.description: Winning with a queen against a pawn.

topics.title: Triangulation
topics.description: Using triangulation to gain the opposition.

topics.title: Zugzwang
